bibl.title: Translation [from Spanish] of telegram from Henry Rose Carter to J. Gil Cardenas, January 16, 1921

div1.p: Carter offers to go to Ferrenafe.

div1.head: Translation [from Spanish] of telegram from Henry Rose Carter to J. Gil Cardenas, January 16, 1921
div1.opener:
TRANSLATION
CABLEGRAMS
Piura January 16, 1921
SALUBRIDAD LIMA
div1.p:
IF YOU WISH I WILL GO FERRENAFE TEMPORARILY WITHOUT
SALARY IN ORDER ASSIST DIAGNOSIS AND CAMPAIGN

div1.head: Telegram from Salubridad and Cardenas to Henry Rose Carter, January 17, 1921
div1.p:
CABLE RECEIVED OFFER ACCEPTED I JUDGE IT IS CONVENIENT
YOU GO FERRENAFE
